title: 你小的时候有过什么梦想

conversations.english: John, did you have a dream when you was a little boy?
conversations.chinese: 约翰，你小的时候有过什么梦想吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of course I did. I dreamed to be a pilot when I grow up. But unfortunately, I didn’t realize it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然有了，我曾梦想长大后做一名飞行员。不过遗憾的是，我没有实现儿时的梦想。

conversations.english: What do you do in your free time, Nancy?
conversations.chinese: 你平时闲暇时都做些什么，南希？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I like playing the violin.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我喜欢拉小提琴。

conversations.english: So are you going to get a new swimsuit?
conversations.chinese: 你打算买一件新泳衣吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I think I'll get this one-piece.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想我会买这件连身泳衣。

conversations.english: Morning, Mary. I haven't seen you in a long time. What's up?
conversations.chinese: 早，玛丽。好久不见了，最近忙什么呢？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I took up a new hobby.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，我有个新爱好．

title: 你爱看哪种类型的电影

conversations.english: Hi, Mary! What do you like to do in your spare time?
conversations.chinese: 你好,玛丽,空闲时候你都做些什么?
conversations.reply_english: Well, I spend a lot of time watching movies.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很多时候我都在看电影.

title: 我昨天去看了乒乓球比赛

conversations.english: Hello Martin. Have you been to any events yet?
conversations.chinese: 你好 Martin, 你去看了什么赛事了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes I have. I went to the table tennis yesterday.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我去了。我昨天去看了乒乓球比赛。

conversations.english: Why are there still so many people overweight despite the current fitness craze?
conversations.chinese: 现在健身这么火,为什么还是有那么多人超重呢?
conversations.reply_english: Well, there are certain factors that effect people's size and weight.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯,还是有一些因素会影响人们的体型和体重的.

conversations.english: The dinner was really good. It knocked my socks off.
conversations.chinese: 晚餐的味道真不错,我真是惊讶不已.
conversations.reply_english: That's very kind of you to say so. Let's try some after-dinner wines.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你这么说我真高兴.饭后我们喝杯葡萄酒吧.

conversations.english: The bartender just gave the last call. Let's order another round, okay?
conversations.chinese: 酒保已经宣布要打烊了，我们再喝一杯如何？
conversations.reply_english: Sure, but let's get a pitcher this time We should be able to down it before they close.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没问题，但这次我们一定要喝大壶的！我想打烊之前我们应该可以喝完。

conversations.english: Wow, the ferris wheel over there is so big. I'd like to take a ride on it.
conversations.chinese: 哇，那边的摩天轮好大啊。我想去坐。
conversations.reply_english: It is called Energy Collector.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那叫聚能飞船。

title: 我是个业余登山爱好者

conversations.english: Are you interested in mountaineering?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢登山运动吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. in some sense.I should say I like mountain climbing, you know, because I'm not so professional. How about you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，从某种意义上来说。我应该说我喜欢爬山，因为我没有这么专业。你呢？

conversations.english: Mr.Ben, What do you think of the book?
conversations.chinese: 本先生，你觉得这本书怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: It's an excellent one. I like it very much.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很好的一本书。我非常喜欢它。

title: 最近大家都在讨论的畅销书

conversations.english: What's that book you have under your arm?
conversations.chinese: 你腋下的那本书是什么？
conversations.reply_english: It's the best seller everyone's been talking about for the last six months.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是最近六个月来大家都在讨论的畅销书。

conversations.english: What's your favorite book?
conversations.chinese: 你最喜欢的书是什么？
conversations.reply_english: It's Gone With the Wind.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是《飘》。

conversations.english: Hi, Bob, I am so glad that you came.
conversations.chinese: 嘿,鲍勃,我很高兴你能来.
conversations.reply_english: Of course I'd come. I couldn't think of a better chance to see all my old friends.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然要来啦.我觉得没有比这更好的机会了,可以见到所有的老朋友.

conversations.english: John, have you ever watched Beijing Opera?
conversations.chinese: 你看过京剧吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I watched once.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我看过一次。

conversations.english: Daddy, I love this Happy Farmhouse. It's really fun.
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，我喜欢这个农家乐活动。确实很有趣。
conversations.reply_english: Great. But no talking, now. Don't forget that you are on a ladder. Take care!
conversations.reply_chinese: 是很不错。但是现在别说话。别忘了你正站在梯子上呢。小心点。

conversations.english: What can I do for you, young man?
conversations.chinese: 有什么需要吗，小伙子？
conversations.reply_english: I need to rent three pairs of skates for the morning.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我需要租三副今天早上用的滑冰鞋。

conversations.english: Wow, this is amazing. I'm glad we've come here. So cool.
conversations.chinese: 哇，这真是太棒了。真高兴我们到这里来。太酷了。
conversations.reply_english: I always love skiing. You know, it's a cool game for cool people. Stay with me and you will be cool, too.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我总是很喜欢滑雪。你知道，这是给酷人玩的酷游戏。跟我一起你也会变酷。

title: 郊外踏青 回归自然

conversations.english: I love breathing fresh air in the suburb places, while sitting in the morning sunshine.
conversations.chinese: 我喜欢这样到郊外，坐在清晨的阳光中，呼吸新鲜空气。
conversations.reply_english: I can't agree more, honey. We need to get away from work from time to time.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我非常同意，亲爱的。我们就需要这样时不时地放下工作出来玩。

conversations.english: Daddy, what's next? What else do we do now?
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，接下来做什么？现在我们还能玩点什么呢？
conversations.reply_english: There is a man-made fishing pond nearby. So, What do you think of going fishing there?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这附近有一个人工渔场。那么，你觉得我们去那里钓鱼怎么样？

conversations.english: What's all the security check about, Jimmy? Does it mean the bar may be a dangerous place?
conversations.chinese: 吉米，这些安全检查是关于什么的啊？这是不是意味着酒吧可能是一个危险的地方啊？
conversations.reply_english: No, of course not. Just in case. Nothing to worry about. Don't you also do this in China?
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，当然不是。只是以防万一。没有什么好担心的。在中国不这样做吗？

conversations.english: Hey, Terry, have all the players got here?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，泰瑞，大家都到齐了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, most of them have arrived. Don't worry. There are still 20 minutes left before the match.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，大部分人都到了。别担心，离比赛开始还差20分钟呢！

conversations.english: Mom, hurry up or there will be no seats available for us.
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，快点，否则我们就没有座位了。
conversations.reply_english: Don't worry, there will be a lot. There will be enough seats for another ten Daniels.
conversations.reply_chinese: 别着急，会有很多的。再来十个丹尼尔都会没有问题。

conversations.english: OK, Nick. Here's the question,What movie and its sequel both won an Oscar for Best Picture?
conversations.chinese: 尼克，你的问题是,哪部电影的原作和续集同时获得了奥斯卡的最佳影片？
conversations.reply_english: The Godfather and The Godfather II, of course. They were both directed by Francis Ford Coppola.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然是《教父》和《教父续集》。它们均由法蓝西斯科波拉执导。

title: 什么样的电影才是好电影

conversations.english: I suppose you like cinematography and costumes and that sort of stuff?
conversations.chinese: 我猜你很喜欢电影摄影和服装之类的东西？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I do. The look of a picture is very important.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对，我喜欢。电影的门面很重要。

title: 谈论音乐和歌曲Listening to the music

conversations.english: Do you like music?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢音乐吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, it depends.
conversations.reply_chinese: 呃，那要看是什么类型的。

conversations.english: What do you reading, Linda?
conversations.chinese: 你在看什么书啊，Linda?
conversations.reply_english: I'm reading a novel, The mill on the floss,writen by the famous novelist gorge aliat.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在读一本小说，是著名的小说家gorge aliat写的《水磨坊》。

conversations.english: You must like to dance, right.
conversations.chinese: 你一定很喜欢跳舞，是吧。
conversations.reply_english: I'd love to. Do you often come here to dance?
conversations.reply_chinese: 喜欢。你经常在这儿跳吗？

conversations.english: What are you doing?
conversations.chinese: 你干什么呢?
conversations.reply_english: I'm just trying to complete today's crossword puzzle. Whenever I get the time, I like to do the crossword puzzles in the paper.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我正在玩今天报纸上的填字游戏.只要一有空,我就喜欢玩报纸上的填字游戏.

conversations.english: You've got a beautiful singing voice!
conversations.chinese: 你唱歌真好听！
conversations.reply_english: It's this high-tech equipment that doctors my vioce a little .Actually ,i am tone-deaf.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是先进的设备帮了我。事实上，我五音不全。

conversations.english: So, which sport do you prefer---basketball or baseball?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢哪种运动,篮球还是棒球?
conversations.reply_english: To be honest, I don't really care for either one.
conversations.reply_chinese: 坦白说两个我都不喜欢.

conversations.english: What did you do last night?
conversations.chinese: 你昨晚干什么了?
conversations.reply_english: I just stayed at home and watched TV.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我就待在家里看电视.

conversations.english: What are you watching on the telly?
conversations.chinese: 你看什么电视节目呢?
conversations.reply_english: There's a great sitcom on Channel 3 that stars in about three minutes.
conversations.reply_chinese: 3分钟之后3频道要播一个特别好看的情景喜剧.

conversations.english: This is a great bar, it's really hotting.
conversations.chinese: 这家酒吧真不错，挺火爆啊。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, this is what a great idea to come here. I'm glad we came out tonight.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对啊，这就是为什么要来这儿。真高兴今晚能出来。

title: 在咖啡厅 In a cafe

conversations.english: Do you know why I choose this cafe?
conversations.chinese: 你知道我为什么选这家咖啡厅吗？
conversations.reply_english: You like the music here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你喜欢这里的音乐。

title: 我最喜欢读者文摘杂志

conversations.english: What's your favorite magazine?
conversations.chinese: 你最喜欢什么杂志。
conversations.reply_english: Off hand, I'd say the Reader's Digests is my favorite.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这么说吧，我最喜欢《读者文摘》。

title: 离开时尚杂志你还能活吗

conversations.english: Have you seen the new Cosmo magazine that I was reading this morning?
conversations.chinese: 你看见我今天早上在看的那期新的大都市杂志了吗?
conversations.reply_english: I think I may have seen it on the kitchen table.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我好像在厨房桌子上看见过.

conversations.english: What are you listening to? Is that Beethoven or Mozart?
conversations.chinese: 你听什么呢?贝多芬还是莫扎特?
conversations.reply_english: It's Beethoven. Do you like it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 贝多芬.你喜欢他的音乐吗?

conversations.english: Do you like playing games?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢玩游戏吗?
conversations.reply_english: I like playing computer games, but I'm not really into board games.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢玩电脑游戏,但是不怎么喜欢玩棋盘游戏.

conversations.english: Isn’t this great? I always wanted to own a farm, live out in the country, grow my own food!
conversations.chinese: 这不是很棒吗？ 我一直想拥有自己的农场，住在农村，种自己的食物。
conversations.reply_english: This is very beautiful. Though I have to confess, I don’t know the first thing about farming!
conversations.reply_chinese: 那确实好极了。虽然我必须承认你的主意很不错，但是我对农场一窍不通。

conversations.english: Hey, Jimmy, you've been sitting in front of the TV all day. Anything interesting on TV?
conversations.chinese: 喂,吉米,你在电视机前坐了一天了,电视上有什么有意思的节目吗?
conversations.reply_english: Not really. Quite boring right now, actually. Mostly infomercials and public serveice announcements.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有啊.其实现在挺无聊的,净是长篇的购物广告和公共服务通知.

conversations.english: Who are those guys?
conversations.chinese: 这些人是谁？
conversations.reply_english: Kobi Bryant and Shaquille O’Neal, they are the Los Angeles Lakers’ star players.
conversations.reply_chinese: 科比·布雷恩和奥尼尔，他们可是洛杉矶湖人队的明星球员。

conversations.english: Have any plans for the weekend, Tom?
conversations.chinese: 汤姆，周末有什么计划吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I’m going for a hike in the southern Rocky Mountains.
conversations.reply_chinese: 有啊。我打算去洛矶山脉南部徒步旅行。

conversations.english: Hey John, nice skates. Are they new?
conversations.chinese: 你好，约翰，冰鞋真漂亮。新的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I just got them. I started playing ice hockey in a community league. So, I finally got myself new skates.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是呀，我刚买的。我开始在一个社团打冰球。所以，终于给自己买了一双新的冰鞋。

conversations.english: Hi, John, how was your vacation?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，约翰，你的假期怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Awesome, we went to Australia and New Zealand.
conversations.reply_chinese: 有点可怕。我们去了澳大利亚和新西兰。

conversations.english: What musical instrument do you play?
conversations.chinese: 你会演奏什么乐器？
conversations.reply_english: I can play the piano a bit.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我会弹一点钢琴。

conversations.english: Hey, Susie, what health club do you belong to?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，苏茜，你参加了哪个健身俱乐部？
conversations.reply_english: Total Fitness, why?
conversations.reply_chinese: Total健身俱乐部。怎么了？

conversations.english: Why are you so crazy about bird-watching? What do you get out of it?
conversations.chinese: 你为什么对赏鸟那么喜爱？你能从中得到什么？
conversations.reply_english: Looking at the beautiful creatures and listening to their songs are such wonderful experiences. I feel as if I'm in direct contact with nature.
conversations.reply_chinese: 观赏这些美丽的生物，聆听它们的歌唱是极美妙的经历。我觉得就像与大自然直接接触。

conversations.english: Do you like to dance?
conversations.chinese: 你爱不爱跳舞？
conversations.reply_english: Sometimes, if there's music playing.
conversations.reply_chinese: 偶尔会跳，如果有音乐的话。

conversations.english: Have you seen any good movies lately?
conversations.chinese: 你最近有没有看什么好电影？
conversations.reply_english: It's ages since I went to see a film.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我已经好久没去看电影了。

title: 那场演出怎么样How was the show

conversations.english: Hey, how was the show?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，那场演出怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Not great. It's a kind of boring.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不怎么样。有点乏味。

conversations.english: Here’s your hot dog and beer. What happened? Did I miss anything?
conversations.chinese: 这是你的热狗和啤酒。情况怎么样？我错过了什么吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, Cal Ripken just hit a home run.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是呀，刚刚卡尔·利普金击了一个本垒打。

conversations.english: Why you are so crazy about Beijing Opera? It's so boring.
conversations.chinese: 你怎么会对京剧那么着迷呢？它太无趣了。
conversations.reply_english: But I think it's fantastic and charming. Well, you have your opinion and I have mine.
conversations.reply_chinese: 可我觉得京剧非常精彩，有魅力。哎，你有你的观点，我有我的观点。

conversations.english: Do you often go to watch sports games?
conversations.chinese: 你常去看体育比赛吗？
conversations.reply_english: I go occasionally when there's a game on near home, but usually I watch it on TV.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我家附近有比赛时，偶尔去看。但我通常看电视里的。

conversations.english: Do you do morning exercises?
conversations.chinese: 你早晨锻炼吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I do one set of shadow-boxing every morning after I get up.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我每天早上起来都打一趟太极拳。

conversations.english: I have some photos here taken by myself. Would you like to see them?
conversations.chinese: 我有些自己拍的照片，你想看吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. Speaking of photos, what type of film will be the best? You know, I'm planning a tour to Jiuzhaigou Valley.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然想看。说起照片，你觉得什么胶卷最好？我正打算去九寨沟旅游。

conversations.english: So Janet, do you do any sports?
conversations.chinese: 所以Janet，你有运动的习惯吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I go to the gym a lot. I am a member of a gym nearby.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这个嘛，我常去健身房。我是附近一家健身房的会员。

title: 我喜欢这最新歌曲合辑

conversations.english: Well, the way you drive, Jen...I still don't think that's a good idea.
conversations.chinese: 唔，珍，依你骑车的方式……我看这并不是个好主意。
conversations.reply_english: I really love this music. It's a compilation.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我真喜欢这音乐。这是精选辑。

conversations.english: Jason, it's your turn.
conversations.chinese: 杰森，该你了。
conversations.reply_english: I hope I get an easy question like you did.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我希望能和你一样抽到简单的。

conversations.english: I have made up my mind. I am getting a tattoo.
conversations.chinese: 我已经打定主意了,我要纹身。
conversations.reply_english: Really? Are you sure?
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的？你确定吗？

conversations.english: What does this have to do with me?
conversations.chinese: 这跟我有什么关系？
conversations.reply_english: You know all about coffee. I need your advice, so I won't look stupid when I order.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你懂咖啡。我需要你的建议，这样我点咖啡的时候才不会像白痴一样。

title: 我在找想学爵士乐的人

conversations.english: Isabelle, you know I'm not interested in fame.
conversations.chinese: 伊莎贝，你知道我对出名没兴趣。
conversations.reply_english: Well, you don't seem to be interested in getting a real job, either.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我看你对找份真正的工作也没兴趣。

conversations.english: How good are you at sports, Bill?
conversations.chinese: 比尔，你对体育运动有多在行？
conversations.reply_english: Are you kidding? I’m terrible! But I love to watch sports. I go to football or baseball games a lot. And I read sports magazines every week.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你开玩笑吗？我很差劲！但是我爱看球赛。我经常去看足球赛或者棒球赛。而且我还每周看体育报。

conversations.english: What's your favorite kind of music?Do you like pop music?
conversations.chinese: 你做喜欢哪类音乐?你喜欢流行乐吗
conversations.reply_english: I like almost all kinds of music. But I like country music best.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢所有音乐。不过我最喜欢乡村音乐

conversations.english: What kind of books do you like?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢什么样的书？
conversations.reply_english: I like reading novels about early America.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢关于美国早期时候的小说。

conversations.english: Did you have any hobbies?
conversations.chinese: 你有什么爱好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, reading is my hobby.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我的爱好是读书。

conversations.english: Great! I landed on Classic Movies.
conversations.chinese: 太棒了。我选到了“经典片”。
conversations.reply_english: I didn't know you liked old movies.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不知道你还喜欢看老片。

conversations.english: I remember you said that you like China because it has cheap beers.
conversations.chinese: 我记得你说过你喜欢中国因为它有便宜的啤酒。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, unbelievably cheap. Carlsberg is less than $1.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，难以置信地便宜。嘉士伯少于1美元。

title: 你在闲暇时间里干什么

conversations.english: What do you do in your spare time?
conversations.chinese: 你在闲暇时间里干什么?
conversations.reply_english: In summer I go hiking，and in winter I ski.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我夏天去远足，冬天滑雪。

title: 周五晚上进城去看电影

conversations.english: It will do you good to go out for entertainment at weekends.What kind of movie do you like best?
conversations.chinese: 周末出去娱乐一下对你有好处。你最喜欢哪类电影。
conversations.reply_english: It's hard to say, I like interesting and significant ones.I don't care whether they're blockbusters or not.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很难说，我喜欢有意思的和有意义的我不在乎是不是畅销电影。

title: 我对故事类电影没兴趣

conversations.english: A new film is on.Have you ever seen it?
conversations.chinese: 正在演一部新电影，你看过了吗？
conversations.reply_english: What kind of movie is it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是哪类电影？

title: 我喜欢综艺节目I like variety shows

conversations.english: What's your favorite TV Program?
conversations.chinese: 你最喜欢什么节目？
conversations.reply_english: I like variety shows.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢综艺节目。

conversations.english: What's the name of the series just showed?
conversations.chinese: 刚才播放的系列剧叫什么名字？
conversations.reply_english: Doctor Butcher.
conversations.reply_chinese: 屠夫医生。

conversations.english: Do you like watching TV?
conversations.chinese: 您喜欢看电视吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes I do ,usually.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，一般来说我喜欢。

conversations.english: I enjoy watching Channel 5.They always have films from all over the world.
conversations.chinese: 我喜欢5频道，它总是播世界名地的电影。
conversations.reply_english: How about the languages.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有语言困难吗？

title: 我喜欢看拳击I prefer boxing

conversations.english: I wonder if we can change to Channel 26.
conversations.chinese: 我想换到二十六频道。
conversations.reply_english: Why?I'd like to see what's on that channel.
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么，我想看看那个频道在播什么？

conversations.english: I'm told Cold Blood just finished its last cut.
conversations.chinese: 听说《冷血》刚刚封镜。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah,it'll make a hit,I think.When will it be on,do you know?
conversations.reply_chinese: 没错儿,电影肯定成功.什么时候上映你知道吗?

conversations.english: Who is your favorite music composer?
conversations.chinese: 你最喜欢哪位音乐家？
conversations.reply_english: I don't have one single favorite, but these days I listen to a lot of Chopin.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我没有最喜欢的一个，但最近我听了不少肖邦。

conversations.english: I love ice cream.
conversations.chinese: 我爱吃冰激凌。
conversations.reply_english: Really? Me, too. What's your favorite flavor?
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的？我也是。你最喜欢什么口味的？

conversations.english: Here's Copellini's, my cousin's store.
conversations.chinese: 这里是可波里尼，我表妹的店。
conversations.reply_english: Sounds like an Italian name with an “i”at the end.
conversations.reply_chinese: 听起来应该是一个尼结尾的意大利名字。

conversations.english: Hey Nick, what are you up to?
conversations.chinese: Nick，忙什么呢？
conversations.reply_english: Not much, just heading over to the shooting range. You wanna come?
conversations.reply_chinese: 不忙，我要去射击场。你想一起去吗？

conversations.english: Which is your preference, tea or coffee?
conversations.chinese: 茶和咖啡你更喜欢哪一个？
conversations.reply_english: My choice would always be tea.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我总是偏爱茶。

conversations.english: So, Karen, what do you do in your free time?
conversations.chinese: 所以，Karen，你平时都做些什么消遣？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I like to play the piano.
conversations.reply_chinese: 恩，我喜欢弹钢琴。

conversations.english: What kind of movies do you like, Sue?
conversations.chinese: Sue，你喜欢哪一类的电影？
conversations.reply_english: I like all kinds of stuff. I admit I love romance.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我什么种类的都喜欢，我承认我爱极文艺爱情片了。

conversations.english: Are you ready to go shopping?
conversations.chinese: 你准备好要去血拼了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Not yet. I'm not finished with my research yet.
conversations.reply_chinese: 还没。我的研究还没做完。

conversations.english: Are you going to watch the Indy Five Hundred on TV this weekend?
conversations.chinese: 你这周末要看印地安拿波里五百大赛车的电视转播吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'm not really into racecar driving.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我其实对赛车兴趣不大。

title: 组建乐队Form a music band

conversations.english: I’m forming a music band.
conversations.chinese: 我正在组建一支乐队。
conversations.reply_english: Do you already know how to play an instrument?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你已经学会如何弹奏乐器了吗？

title: 我更喜欢橘子I like orange better

conversations.english: Which do you like better, orange or lemon?
conversations.chinese: 橘子和柠檬你更喜欢哪个？
conversations.reply_english: I like orange better.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我更喜欢橘子.

conversations.english: Do you watch a lot of TV?
conversations.chinese: 你看电视多吗？
conversations.reply_english: Not really. I could take it or leave it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不一定，可看可不看。

conversations.english: And the cover is great! The colors are brilliant!
conversations.chinese: 封面也很棒！这颜色真是夺目啊！
conversations.reply_english: Give me a break. You don't care about the colors. You just like the hot babe on the cover.
conversations.reply_chinese: 得了吧你。你才不管颜色。你只是喜欢封面上的辣妹。

conversations.english: Honey, do you know what color the carrot is?
conversations.chinese: 孩子，你知道胡萝卜是什么 颜色吗？
conversations.reply_english: Mom, it's orange?
conversations.reply_chinese: 妈妈，是桔黄色的吧。

conversations.english: I've heard The Hitchhiker would be on next week. I want to see it.
conversations.chinese: 我听说搭车人将会在下周上映。我想去看。
conversations.reply_english: Is it horror movie?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是部恐怖电影吗？

conversations.english: Look, Forest Gump is on at six thirty.
conversations.chinese: 快看，六点半将上映阿甘正传。
conversations.reply_english: Really? It was on in 1994 for the first time. And it is really a classic.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？这部片子在1994年首映。它确实很经典。

conversations.english: Harry, do you like the opera?
conversations.chinese: 哈利，你喜欢歌剧吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, not really.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，不怎么喜欢。

conversations.english: Everything is now. I'm kind of sick of it.
conversations.chinese: 什么东西都跟这有关。我都有点烦了。
conversations.reply_english: Each ring has 3 small diamonds inside the band.
conversations.reply_chinese: 每只戒指的内环都有三颗小钻石。

conversations.english: Mark. Where have you been? I’ve been calling you all morning.
conversations.chinese: 马克，你去哪儿了？一个上午我都在找你。
conversations.reply_english: I’ve been playing computer games.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我一直在玩电脑游戏。

conversations.english: Hi! Ben! Nice meeting you here!
conversations.chinese: 嗨！本！真高兴在这儿见到你！
conversations.reply_english: Hi, Terry! Nice meeting you here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨！泰瑞！在这儿碰到你真好。

conversations.english: Hey, May, look, Is that the the poster of the movie we saw yesterday?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，阿美，你看，那是我们昨天看的那个电影的海报吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, that's right. That's the poster of the The Witch.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，那是女巫的海报。

conversations.english: Dad, I want to learn how to drive this summer vacation.
conversations.chinese: 爸爸，我想在这个暑假学学怎样开车。
conversations.reply_english: That's a good idea. You'd better hurry up before they've filled all classes. Many people are learning how to drive now.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好主意。在所有班都被报满之前，你最好快点。现在很多人都在学开车。

conversations.english: How good are you at sports, Bill?
conversations.chinese: 比尔，你对体育运动有多在行？
conversations.reply_english: Are you kidding? I’m terrible! But I love to watch sports. I go to football or baseball games a lot. And I read sports magazines every week.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你开玩笑吗？我很差劲！但是我爱看球赛。我经常去看足球赛或者棒球赛。而且我还每周看体育报。
